hero.title: Dental Implants Specialist
hero.subtitle: Dr. Greg Pedro - Precise, Pain-free Dental Implants in a Day
hero.description: Comprehensive dental implant solutions to restore missing teeth, improve oral function, and enhance the natural beauty of your smile with financing options available.

doctor.name: Dr. Gregory Pedro, DMD
doctor.title: Board-Certified Prosthodontist & Implant Specialist
credentials: Temple University School of Dentistry - DMD
Staten Island Hall of Fame Inductee
doctor.experience: Over 25 years of experience in dental implant placement with extensive training in prosthetic restoration and full mouth reconstruction

services.name: Single Tooth Dental Implants
services.description: Replace individual missing teeth with permanent, natural-looking implants that function like your natural teeth.

services.name: Full Mouth Reconstruction
services.description: Complete restoration of all teeth using dental implants for patients with extensive tooth loss or damage.

services.name: Implant Overdentures
services.description: Secure dentures anchored by dental implants for superior comfort and stability.

services.name: Computer-Guided Implant Surgery
services.description: Precision implant placement using advanced 3D imaging and surgical guides for optimal results.

testimonials.text: Dr.Pedro did an extraction of my tooth followed by a dental bone graft. He explained me the process of getting a dental implant The procedures were painless.I had no problem with the healing process.I highly recommend Dr.Pedro.He is an excellent doctor, great manners and very friendly. The office is beautiful and the staff is very welcoming.
testimonials.author: Maria S.

testimonials.text: A dental specialist that is a combination of: professionalism, detail oriented, honest & caring is a rare find these days! Dr. G. Pedro placed 4 implants for me well over 15 years ago. I moved out of town & subsequently had 2 more implants placed by another prosthodontist. One of the 2 recent implants failed. I came back to Dr. Pedro to save the day by rectifying the situation. The original titanium implants of 15 years have not given me any problems.
testimonials.author: Robert M.
